name: Youda Safari
description:
bigfishgames.com (from Ad Blurbs)

Give all the tourists a once in their lifetime holiday experience! Guide your visitors past crazy monkeys, rebellious rhinos and hilarious hippos! Mind the lions in the way and look for many more wicked wildlife animals in Youda Safari, a fun Time Management game. Choose the best photo moments, find these special rare and shy animals and upgrade your parks with new vehicles, bigger tourist facilities, and radical restaurants.

  • Unique upgrades
  • Beautiful scenery
  • Go on a suspenseful safari!
